text: Binɨb Klays nop gos ma nepal okok, kɨli gɨpal ak ke mɨdeb. Anɨb ak nɨbi ayɨp jɨmñɨl ma yenɨmɨb, wog jɨmñɨl ma gɨnɨmɨb. Tɨtay dɨl? Binɨb God agak tek kɨdek gɨpal okok ayɨp, binɨb God takaw tɨbɨlɨkɨpal okok ayɨp jɨmñɨl yenɨgel tek lup akaŋ? Mɨlek ak ayɨp, kɨsɨlɨm ak ayɨp jɨmñɨl yenɨgel tek lup akaŋ? Mel yɨbɨl.
